page.title: 18POLITICS
page.content:
At the moment,in our area,SDP(Social Democratic Party)are in power. Conservatives are not very popular in this area,and Labour are in the middle.The SDP seems to have made many promises and not kept them.Labour used to be in power,and were quite an effective government,but,like the SDP did not keep their promises.Labour seemed more caring for your community than either Conservative or SDP.At the moment,schools are used as polling stations,as well as church halls,and this makes it easier for people to vote,as there are schools in almost every community.
By{Gary Christer
